description:
# Description

The mark of a participant in the Pharaoh's Treasure Season.

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)

attributes.trait_type: XP increase during Pharaoh's Treasure Season
Extra Amber Fossils from Deliveries and Chores

name: Pharaoh's Treasure Banner
